content.rendered:
Clear Fog Free Vision in Daily Activity

Problems with Ordinary Lenses



Benefits with FOG FREE Coated Lens



  • Fog free & clear vision in daily activity
  • Enhanced light transmit
  • In-built fog repellent properties
  • Special features of hydrophobic coating
  • Checmical & Solvent Resistant

FogFree lenses with a new advanced technology come with superior properties, designed to provide fog free vision to wearers in their daily activities, while enjoying premium visual comfort. Designed with the active wearer in mind, FogFree provides a clear vision solution for multipurpose uses, both indoors and outdoors, with more efficient and optimal performance.
